section.heading: East End grocery and retail incentive tax exemption.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-83: § 3 of D.C. Law 22-83 provided that the change made to this section by § 2(b) of D.C. Law 22-83 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 7028(b) of Fiscal Year 2019 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-434, July 30, 2018, 65 DCR 8200).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 7028(b) of Fiscal Year 2019 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-458, Oct. 3, 2018, 0 DCR 0).
